definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: But the visitors could not comprehend the St Kildans they gawped at.
sentences.chinese: 但是，遊客們盯着聖基爾達人卻並不能理解他們。

sentences.english: She's a real fashionista, one who can tell Gucci from Pucci.
sentences.chinese: 她是個能區分普奇和古奇的時尚達人。

sentences.english: This open-minded person is always looking on the bright side of things.
sentences.chinese: 這位達人總是什麼事情都想得開。

sentences.english: As geeks and nerds, we’re super-excited by touch.
sentences.chinese: 作爲電腦狂人和達人，我們對觸摸技術都非常癡迷。

sentences.english: Now how about the Seduction Science guy who has conscious control over the sexual state he projects?
sentences.chinese: 現在來說說把妹達人是如何控制他的性張力的。

sentences.english: whether the twitterati are more annoying or just more flighty than everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 也不知道是否社交網絡達人會比較惹人厭或更輕浮。

sentences.english: They tend to be upbeat, optimistic and outgoing. They are high-energy multitaskers.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是樂觀外向的人，都是能充當多面手的達人。

sentences.english: You will be happy. You will become a saint.
sentences.chinese: 你會修來好多樂福，變成一位達人。

sentences.english: The sphere showed a virtual army of Garudans pouring into the basin.
sentences.chinese: 通訊球的影像顯示了一大隊嘎魯達人正湧入這個盆地。

sentences.english: Distinctive originality which is always reflected in the polytropic shopping space brings fashionistas life kaleidoscope.
sentences.chinese: 獨特創意的百變空間，開啓時尚達人生活萬花筒。

sentences.english: Complete a Bow Mission and begin growing the legend of Azkâr.
sentences.chinese: 完成一個弓的精通任務來逐步成長爲射術達人。
品牌商城，時尚達人，男人衣櫥。

sentences.english: Trend-spotters have not planted a flag here just yet.
sentences.chinese: 潮流達人目前還沒有在這裏插上旗幟。

sentences.english: "China's Got Talent" will retain the three-person jury panel of the original British version and will not change its members during the run.
sentences.chinese: 中國達人的評委也是三個，和英國達人的設置一樣。

sentences.english: "China's Got Talent" will retain the three-person jury panel of the original British version and will not change its members during the run.
sentences.chinese: 中國達人的評委也是三個，和英國達人的設置一樣。

sentences.english: My sister is such a pro with the eyeliner swoosh.
sentences.chinese: 我姐姐真是一個變色眼線的達人。

definition: to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
pertaining to/concerning/with regard to/about/a matter of
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
